content.detailedDescription:
Ithey were was walking at the park across the street(kathryn albertson park). i had my camera with me and was hoping to see the deer that live in the park and get some new pics of them.  as i was walking thru a pathway and onto the grass i noticed something out of the ordinary hovering in the distance.  kind of square and had a copperish,brown color.  at first i thought it may be a kite but noticed that it was completely still and absolutely silent.  i took several pictures and zoomed in while taking them.  after a couple of minutes i continued to walk to a different area and keep an eye on the object.  as i walked around a corner and looked up again it seemed to be gone.  i continued with my walk.  but i knew i had witnessed something very out of the ordinary that evening.  i was reminded of this when i ran across an article about the object from the witnesses.  i just thought since i also observed this that i should go ahead and report it.  i will be going thru my pictures on my computer to locate the ones that i have of the object.  from what i remember they were fair and i do think a bit better than the ones from the other gentlemans cell phone camera.

thank you
*(wit's initials deleted--cms/sg)
content.summary: Observed something hovering at the park,

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from santa barbara to my home in santa maria i was at a friends house and left his house around 3:30 am nov 3 2010 taking the 101 highway heading  north just past the highway that leads to san marcos pass and the michael jackson neverland ranch i hit a stretch of highway where it was pitch black and i was thinking i hope i dont hit a dear at that moment something in the sky to my right caught my eye hovering in the sky  very low maybe a hundred yards up was a triangular craft making no sound  i slowed and blinked to double check my vision and it was still there i kept my eyes on it as much as i could to be safe  maybe after around two minutes  it rotating clockwise very slowly  then it climbed and made a gradule right turn and got smaller and smaller until it left my sight. when i was positive i was witnessing this i felt a chill from the tips of my fingers to my toes one last strange detail i made out was it looked liquidy i could see little ripples like wakes on water.Kind of like it was transparent.
content.summary: Triangular small white lights in each corner larger dim light in middle light orange in color.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside at 7:30 pm pdt observing aircraft with binoculars from my house, which is on a ridge at 630' elevation. it was a cloudless, windless, moonless night.

i observed a bright white circular light travelling southwest to northeast from horizon to horizon in a straight line. i first thought the object was an aircraft, but the object appeared larger and brighter than saturn and had no navigation lights.  it was moving several times faster than commercial jets and was also faster and much brighter than any satellite that has been seen from the same location.  

the object went horizon to horizon in less than 30 seconds.  there was no noise heard.  the object remained bright white for a few seconds after passing overhead, then changed color from a bright white to a dull orange. i continued to observe until i could no longer see it.
content.summary: Large object went horizon-horizon in 30 secs extremely bright & changed color
Critical information.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend *(name deleted--cms/sg) pull in to john u loyd park in danya beach to park and make out. once we stoped i put in a nine inch nails tape, the song bow down before the one you serve started to play. i looked out to my right window gazing at the ocean, when i looked up i saw what i thought was a airplain coming for a landin. i noticed it was not because it had no landind gear lights. and when it got close to shore the light from the orb reflected off the ocean. just then i heard nothing, no ocean waves, i can see them but not hear them and the music stopped and the frogs in the canal stopped cricking. it passed slowly behing the trees elumaiteing everything. then it eventually over the canal till couldn't see anymore. everything came back to normal and me and my friend question our selfs. and when i looked over to my right there was two more.  me and him started to freak out. thetwo objects reach the shore line, one an orbe the other a cigar shape. the same thing happen" all aspect of reality stopped.  i wanted to get out of the car but *(same name deleted--cms/sg) wouldn't let me go.  i kicked and kicked the stering wheel and him all the while hanging out the window. i was staring at the last cigar shaped orbed and can see into the window and seeing the beings.  they were all looking at me. it was terrifing but i wanted to get out of the car and go back and see more. finally the ocean waves came back,the frogs came back and the music came back on, *(same name deleted--cms/sg)was comatosed, the sun was coming up and the song was still playing the same song only a couple of minutes in. i dont know what happend but my friend *(same name deleted--cms/sg) never wants to talk about it. but i always do!
content.summary: Two white orbes and one cigar shaped

content.detailedDescription: In nature preserve above bothell everett highway i saw what looked like jet trail or chem trail, a stripe of white cloud like matter directly above me, looked man made and is unusual...I followed this down to the bothell everett highway.  at the crosswalk where mill creek blvd. meets the highway, i waited for the light, then looked up in the sky just at dusk there was a very large glowing blue white object hovering at roughly 30��� which then slowly reformed shape into a comet/rocket and moved up and to the east, back toward the preserve.
content.summary: Bright blue white glowing oval turning into comet

content.detailedDescription:
Southeast of houston, texas area. on my way to work on thursday, november 4, 2010 at 7:16 am, i saw a ufo! i was driving west bound oh hwy 225 in between deer park and pasadena. it was dawn and the sky was clear and blue. i noticed a very large bright white round (orb) light to the southwest traveling extremely fast headed to the north - north west.  this would be at my 10 o'clock position through my windshield.

i kept looking at it because it seemed strange, too bright and too large. i countinued looking at it and the road back and forth since i was driving. i have seen many plane lights due to hobby airport being to the south of hwy. 225 and bush international being to the north. with planes, jets, and helicopters, i have always noticed small red lights as well.

at first i thought it was a star or a comet, but it was absolutely crystal clear blue sky - not one star, no stars, nothing. if it was a comet, the tail would have been visible. it actually looked like a small bright full moon.

my phone rang at 7:17 am and i continued looking at the light as i was driving. i mentioned to the caller what i was seeing, but since i was talking on the phone, i didn't think i could take a picture with my cell phone. then it just vanished in thin air - no smoke, no jet or plane in the sky -  nothing!!! visibility was clear for several miles - if it was a plane, once the light turned off, there was enough daylight that the plane would still be visible, but there was nothing.
content.summary: Large round (orb) white light traveling at a high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: It was exactly 7am, i remember that because that when i leave to get my sister to take her to work. i was going to my car and right before i got in i looked up at the stars like i always do. (it was dark out with a slight sliver of light) i saw a bight light moving fast, i thought it was a star at first, then i noticed it was moving very fast, also there was no sound. now living within 50 miles of a major airport i see planes and jets a lot, so i would know if it were one! also it was way to high, i have seen comets and meteorites and could tell it was not one. after about 5 or 6 seconds of watching it, it quickly dissipated up higher within 2 seconds. again it was crystal clear out, with a tiny bit of light, so it was easy to follow. i don't know what can move that fast, high (with the exception of a space ship, but i live in kansas so probably not!) or not have a tiny bit of sound! i don't know if it was a ufo, but i don't know what else it could have been. if anyone else had seen it, please feel free to email me.
content.summary: Light flies fast across sky and dissapears

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my exercise room and sitting on the floor for a moment when i looked out the window around 9:00 pm and saw one of the bright planets, i believe this may be venus. 
i was facing south so the next closest city to me would be westlake, ohio. 
as i was staring at it, i noticed an object in the distance that had red and green flashes.I thought it was my eyes playing tricks so i grabbed the binoculars and watched it. the object looked like it was one shape, then changed to another. as i watched it turned into a sphere and then from the sphere only for just  a few seconds, maybe ??? 10, there was what looked like a beam of light that came from it.  it wasn't a plane with it's lights on though i thought at first it might be. this object though was for lack of words, strange.
i called my family members as i watched it and described what i was seeing before it just disappeared.  the lights green/red  flashed in no specific order. 
a few weeks earlier, a woman and her friends saw an object as they came from a bar in westlake. they took a video of it. 
this did not look like what i saw and unfortunately i don't have a camera that is capable of taking photos in the dark.
my feelings are that as humans we continue to take from the earth and perhaps with all the drilling, mining and abuse of our planet, whatever it was, has a concern for our race.
i wasn't afraid but i surely wouldn't go out looking for it either. i am asking my husband for a video camera that will be capable of taking long range videos at night for christmas!
content.summary: I saw an object from my window, it flashed green and red, i watched as it changed shapes, then turned into a sphere with a light shinning from it and then disappeared in a matter of approximately 5 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were playing camping in the yard of our house in the back of my dads old pickup. we both fell asleep late talking about hunting then i awoke startled by the vibrations in my chest and the sound of that hum was very strange.Kind of pulsating slower and faster all at once. as i leaned forward i sat there not sure what to think.There it came over the roof of the house about 50 ft up and only showing one side of it self. it moved slowly to the backyard then stopped in full view, three green triangles stacked with two very small rectangle red bars below the triangles pulsing and moving back and forth under the triangles.They would sometimes split and come back together always at different times.Ok while i watched hypnotically the first thing that went through my head was no one is going to believe me...I tried very hard to shake my brother as to not draw attention. i was terrified at first anyway as i glanced over to my brother laying there with his eyes wide open and looking straight up, he wouldn't move a bit when i was pushing on his arm he just stared straight up like he was unconscious. my brother had his eye's open the whole time not looking at anything.....I felt like he was not meant to see this ....To this day he remembers nothing. as we shared glances for a short while it gave me purpose to my life. and it would not be my last.The pulsing noise quieted then it slowly started away from me at 45 deg.Angle then zip ............It was gone. i immediately grabbed my arm to make a bruise on it to have a acknowledgment of thee experience. then my brother awoke and rolled over.I felt later as though it was reading me some how. like it had thee ability to use your thoughts as an active camouflage.
content.summary: Herd progressivly load humming noise, it moved from power poll to backyard then straight up

content.detailedDescription:
Me and another 3 friends, one from brazil,australia and one from mexico  where walking on my friend���s biofarm before taking a mexican bath called temazcal.It was almost at sunset 6.00-6.30 pm
i took the film from east to west. you can see the sun going down.

i was filming with my digital camera, kodak 8 mp. with hd video.
i could hear or see nothing but,

after i finished and transfered it to my pc.
i analized with quicktime player and you can see all those ufos 
in the film

there are cilinders, rounds and bullets like,

they seem to know that i was filming because they flew in front of my camera.

it is a ufo dancing,
its fantastic.

i could estimate their speed: 2500-12,000 kms per hour.
that is almost 2 to 4 miles per second!

that is the reason we can not see them, 
our human eye is not that fast,!
content.summary: 60 ufos on video.

content.detailedDescription: We received this call from a witness that we have worked with in the past about a substance  that has appeared in her backyard. this is similar to the substance she found earlier in the year that was complimented with a sighting of a cigar shaped object. i was called to assist because of the time frame from which we wanted to collect data. i asked a new fi, lynette gutshall if she was available and we both arrived on scene 942am the following morning. this was 4 november.Upon entering the scene, we clearly saw this substance and it did look " dropped" and splattered. we did our initial readings and found no magnetic, electrical or radio waves that would be abnormal. the air/environmental temperature was 58degrees and the actual substance temp. read 45.6 degrees. debris around the substance such as leaves  or small branches read the same temp. as environment. we photographed the entire area, including the surround landscaping. we took shots of obvious sizing of the pieces and area of interest. evidence collection was done on a 4 level series. since the substance appeared moist, i took swab rubbing samples, cottonball swipe sample and collected the substance itself in plastic canisters and plastic bagging. physical evidence form was completed by the witness and released for analysis. we did a thorough grid search thru the backyard and did not find anything remotely close nor did we find anymore. we did random stops and searched the neighborhood looking for any evidence of this substance or anyone that has seen this before and we could find none.
content.summary: Case is being submitted for the witness by chase kloetzke, deputy director of investigations/star team manager.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking back from 7-eleven with my friend janel. on the way back, just past the intersection of barton skyway and s lamar, an unknown, silent craft, there was a spherical object with a pulsating red glow from the interior passed us. it was directly in front of us. it came over the treeline, from right to left, it was approximately 40/50 feet in the air and was not very large. it was travelling rather quickly, so the entire episode lasted about 1 minute. i was in a state of shock as i looked over to my friend, looked back up and then looked back at my friend. i commented, "do you see that?" i'm like, "that's not a plane or helicopter". i stayed dumbfounded/in awe for about 20-30 seconds. my friend snapped me out of it and was like, "film it". i am upset with myself as i had a camera phone, but as i fumbled to get the camera/video function turned on, the craft was about 1/4 mile away. it was flying in the general direction of the airport. the craft did not seem very large, almost like some type of orb, between 5-10 feet in diameter, but i'm horrible with depth perception. all i can say it was fairly low to the ground for an aircraft and did not seem very large--but the pulsating red glow was its most salient aspect.
content.summary: Pulsating black/red  aircraft flew over treeline and over street from right to left

content.detailedDescription: I wanted to report a sighting in the summer of 1998 in sedgewickville missouri which is located about halfway between st louis and sikeston missouri. i was doing a job with my boss building a barn for his mother. we lived in sikeston at the time and it was about a hour and a half drive so we decided to camp out during the week and go home on the weekends.  it was around 8 o'clock in the evening and we were in the tent when we noticed a red light in the sky, so we decided to go out to get a better look. the object was bright red, didn't flash or change colors. it was constant. the object was between 50 and 100 feet of the ground. the size im not sure but if i put my left hand on one side and my right hand on the other my hands were about 2 ft apart. im not saying it was two feet wide because if u see a plane in the sky it looks small but up close its huge, so i guess it all mathmatics to determing the actual size. there were a couple of things i noticed that were odd. one was that it was completely silent. two was that the edges were perfectly defined. you know when u see a light in the distance the edges are fuzzy, this wasn't like that, you could make out the edges. the object was perfectly round, glowed bright red but didn't light up the sky or the ground. the object moved in a northernly path for about 20 seconds then stopped and hovered for about 5 to 7 seconds. then it went east for another 5 seconds or so, hovered again for another 5 or so seconds then shot straight into the air and dissapeared. the object made a smooth path, no zigzaging or up and down moting.  my boss mentioned to me before hand that he grew up in the area and strange lights have been noticed for years, at least as long as he can remember.  i hope this information helps with ur cause. i appreciate ur time and keep up the good work, the truth needs to be known. we are ready                                                                                             sincerely                                                                        eric sadler
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright red orb moving north then hovering , moved east then hovered then shot straight into the air.

content.detailedDescription: I was not at the moment but i saw him on web cam
content.summary: Was seen in web camera that takes pictures constantly

content.detailedDescription:
At about 12:45 to 1:15am i was outside walking the dog. it was a perfectly clear nite and we had a new moon so the skies were dark and the stars were very visable. for some reason i had a gut feeling that i was going to see something strange for about 2 days prior. anyway, while looking at the stars i was thinking i was going to see a shooting star. after about 10 minutes or so looking straight up in the sky i saw something twinkling out of the corner of my eye so i kept looking even though it was very cold out side. 

as i looked in all directions of the sky i could not see a plane or helicoptor and noticed how calm and quiet it was outside. then i looked over top of my apartment building away from the germantown library i noticed 2 perfectly shaped triangles side by side with 3 round soft white lights one at each point in the triagle. the objects moved in a straight line. i coulc not see any metal or other detailing and there wasn't any clouds in the sky to determine the height of the ufos. it tooked the ufos only 5 to 8 seconds to cross the nightime sky until i could not see them anymore. it would have taken a regular airplane at least 1 to 2 minutes to travel that far.  

i know that this was not an airplane because there was no audible sound from the craft and also the rate of speed was faster than imajinable. about 5 minutes later i saw a shooting star and 2nd white round object that made a cursive pattern in the sky. not sure what the that was. 

the 2 ufos as they traveled kind of had a shadow of soft light as they went by in the night time sky. i can not explain what other type of craft this could have been. i also can not explain why i felt 2 days prior in my my gut that i was going to see something strange. it is almost like i was ment to see this phenomenal event.
content.summary: Two triangle shaped objects with 3 soft white lights at the point

content.detailedDescription:
Now i've seen lights in the sky before.  i've seen them make speeds
across the sky that i don't think conventional craft can make...  and
weird aerobatics that none should be able to make.

specifically, those were 30 and 20 some years ago.  but tonight.  i
saw something both weird, and awesome, if you'll forgive the nerdy
enthusiasm.

so my boss and i were outside looking up at jupiter at 7:15pm.  i'm an
amateur astronomer and was trying to convince my boss that he needs to
go get himself a nice 5" or 8" refractor and get into the hobby.  we
talked...  i turned to look up at jupiter again...  and he did the
same.  i turned to look at him and he looked at me and it took that
half to full second for my brain to go "i think you'd better look back
up...  there was something not right there..."

i looked up and saw what i thought was a flock of birds at first instinct.  you know, that chevron shape...   maybe some canadian geese.  trouble is, you can hear canadian geese flying south.  i immediately ruled that out.  a number of things flashed through my head as i stared, and they were ruled out as well.  it was at that point both of us went "what the @#$!@ is that?!"  how big was it?  how high was it?  not sure.  it was in open air so i had no frame of reference.  i can only guess based on the light shining off of the bottom of it from the city below that it was maybe 1000-1500 feet up...  maybe 200-300 feet across.  it almost looked to have a leading edge white glow, and a brownish color underneath.  it was chevron shaped (   v shaped  ) and i could almost make out some structure underneath it.  like vent ports or something.  it was absolutely silent.  it wasn't creeping along, nor was it moving like a bat out of hell either.  it was moving at a reasonable clip...  maybe 200mph?

the night was clear...  and the air crisp.  despite it being dark, it was unmistakably not a plane, bird, etc.

what immediately came to my mind was "if it wasn't for the lights from the city...  no one would even know that thing was up there..."  how many more are just creeping along like that in the middle of the night?  nobody looks up...  and if they did, they might see a trail of stars winking out for a few seconds and attribute it to a cloud or two...

i know the whole thing is relatively cliche, but that's what i saw.  and it kicked ass.   :d
content.summary: Chevron moving silently across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Driving south on highway 430 in south little rock there appeared to be a cross shaped object hovering above the tree line about 200-300 feet. it hovered for five minutes when i passed it on the freeway, got off an offramp before the w. dixon exit to turn back to examine what was in the sky, and it was gone. i and other motorists did the same thing. tried turning around after passing it to have another look. it literally disappeared. it was white in shape with a red stripe of some sort. it emitted extreme heat from the entire flat bottomed surface of it. i thought it was a plane until i noticed it wasn't getting further away or any closer, and because i was only 10 miles from the little rock airport. it was directly in the take off flight path from that airport. i saw a plane, after the craft was gone, fly right by where it had been sitting.  i was completed baffled at the fact it wasn't moving then it just seemed to disappear into thin air. i wanted to turn around and get video of this with my cell phone off the highway but it was gone. it had some kind of writing on it but i couldn't tell what it was. the entire bottom of the craft looked like the trail behind a jet engine that has been turned on.
the pictures i have supplied are the side, and front views of what i saw drawn to the best of my ability. i think i could make a better model with clay or play-doh. i do believe it was about 40-50 feet long and i do not remember if it had any windows.
content.summary: White cross shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
While i was watching a bald eagle glide approximately 20 ft. above me, i felt inspired to take a photo of the street view with the beautiful blue sky.  the photo was taken at 3:33pm edt.  

at 4:03 - 4:07pm edt, i took more photos in a different location in cape coral that showed the object by the sun, but wasn't visible to the naked eye. 

after downloading all my photos then reviewing them, i discovered an unknown object in the sky in many photos.  the object wasn't seen before, during and after the photos.
content.shape: Cigar,   Disc,   Oval,   Square,   Rectagular,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: The object in the clear daylight sky was only visible on photos.

content.detailedDescription:
I was talking to my husband while at my son's baseball practice, when i noticed a bright light, which suddenly became brighter, almost like a really bright falling star, but much brighter more like an explosion.  it was located towards the southeast mountains surrounding lake havasu city.  i watched this light, which did not move, but it was amber and when it became bright it was almost red, white, and then returned to amber.  i kept watching the general area, and seconds later i saw it miles away and it became brighter, same colors, and then disappeared.  then again, but this time it went up and to west.  only this time, when it became brighter, it stayed bright, and split into two, with the second one moving instantly and directly horizontal, what must have been miles away, in the eastern direction.  they both stayed there for what seemed like five seconds and then they were gone.  i directed my husbands attention to them, after the second sighting, and asked what he thought it was, and he witnessed the movement and splitting.  he was just as amazed as i was.  these things moved much faster than any aircraft i have ever seen or know about.  

1) i was talking to my husband at my 12-year-old son's baseball practice.

2) the fact that it was so bright was the first thing that attracted my attention.  i have never seen anything so bright in the sky.

3) when i first noticed the object, i thought of a falling star, but it was not falling, it was actually just sitting there.

4) it was difficult to tell if there was any shape to them, as they were so far away in the distance.  the light that they emitted was extremely bright and appeared round.  it also moved instantly, unlike anything i have ever seen.

5) when i first saw it, i thought falling star, i always catch them.  then immediately i thought, "i am seeing my very first ufo", and i turned my husbands head to see it.  we were both amazed, and i felt calm, and thankful that i was able to witness such an amazing event.  

6) the objects once split appeared to move just beyond the mountains, and i was unable to see them after that.  i tried to look for them several times up until about 2130, but did not see anything that would appear to be them.

i tried to get my camera phone to work, but the program would not come up, and it is unfortunate.  i think i was in too much shock to figure out an alternative, and i did not want to stop looking at them.  they were beautiful.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several lights, becoming brighter, splitting in two, and then disappear

content.detailedDescription: I heard the noise of planes outside my home, went out and saw a formation of planes and went inside the house to get the camera, took the first pic and then the second , it did not pass more than 10 seconds between the shoots . i did not kept on looking at the planes. after viewing the photos in my computer a notice a black spot in the second  picture, when i zoom in it gets blurry.
content.summary: Taking pictures

content.detailedDescription: This video contains many ufo - orb clips from the footage taken in the arizona desert on the night of november 1st 2010. all three full version videos of the footage can be viewed on the youtube channel *(various links moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg.
content.summary: Ufo in the arizona sky - footage from november 1st 2010

content.detailedDescription:
I wish i had not waited months to reports this, but until recently did not know who to report it to. i saw a television program that described your field researchers and i liked that your set scientific and observational standards. i do not like wild speculation and absurd conjectures as i often see in deranged programs like ufo hunters or whatever it is called. i like mysteries to be approached rationally. this brings me back to the night of august 11, 2010. i have long wondered if anyone else had reported anything for that night. soon after the event, i posted an oblique statement on my facebook page ���did anyone else see that?��� simply so i would not forget the date and time. i do not jump to conclusions, but i have also failed to find a prosaic explanation for the event. 

there were two other people with me who saw the strange object. i will leave their names off of here for the time being. [they live nearby, but i have not asked their permission to include them in this report.] we were standing in my driveway just after full dark. it  was likely between 8 and 9pm. checking the time for full darkness at the time of the year should some up with a very close approximate time. there was a bright moon shinning in the in the southeast quadrant of the sky. i think if it were not for that, we would have seen nothing. 

i was facing north toward my companions as we stood there talking. the evening was pleasant and it had grown dark. it was not unusual for us to stand outside and talk although we were about to say goodnight. one of my companions was looking behind me and saw it first. she made a gasping noise or other sound while looking into the sky behind me. i turned to see what she was looking at. we live about 20 miles from philadelphia international airport in the town of richwood, nj and frequently have large numbers of commercial airliners circling overhead. i expected something of this sort. what i saw was very different.

i turned to look south and saw it almost immediately or at least the impression of it. i also said a rather surprising swear word which i would not normally use in this company.     the object was moving quickly in a east-north-east direction [toward the delaware river and chester, pa] and at first it was just a suggestion of movement because it was black against black. it was simply a different shape of black flying with no lights at all. the moonlight caught on the shape and revealed it as the sharp-angled boomerang without further detail to the surface.  

it annoys me to report it as an angular boomerang shape because i know there have been many other reports like that. it was very large in the sky. much larger than the commercial airliners we see daily on their approach to philadelphia. i do not know what altitude the circling airliners are at this point in their approach, but that is probably not too difficult to find out. their windows are easily visible. this was far larger than those. there were no airplanes in sight at the time of the event. 

the trouble is that for it to be that size it would have to have been either unusually low and close to us or farther away and unbelievably vast in size. the object cruised quickly by without the slightest sound or change in speed or altitude. i hoped it would pass in front of the moon, but unfortunately it moved ���beneath��� where the moon was and was quickly lost to view in  the dark. it was moving fast but without knowing the distance i would not guess at its speed. it was gone before there was much chance of further reaction. i turned to my companions and we were all equally dumbfounded. there was nothing more to do except head inside. i typed the note on facebook so i would not forget, but i also had hoped someone else might say something. it was a long shot. no one else reported anything. 

i have seen stealth bombers flying in the desert and they are huge. this object was at least that large, but i felt it was larger still. the stealth was my best suspect as i racked my brain, but it does not make sense. for a stealth to be that large, it would have to be too close. why would a bomber be flying so low in a densely populated area? a stealth can easily fly above local air traffic. flying without lights would be extremely dangerous around this crowded airspace even if you were training the crew in radar evasion. that part is speculation as i do not know if they even do this sort of live training. we saw no evidence of exhaust, but i believe a stealth does mask that. if it was that close, we should have heard it. i doubt that even a stealth can be that silent. 

i have not been able to think of an easy explanation for the object.
content.summary: A very large, boomerang-shaped object tracked across the sky in a ne direction just after full dark.

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding in the car with my dad through the city and i was looking up at the night sky. when i noticed a star like object moving across the sky pretty fast, then suddenly it stopped. then dissapeared. it was moving in a westarly direction not changing course, just smoothly traveling west. until it stopped then vanished.

i thought it could have been a plane but it had no colours comming from it, (just a white star like object) it was very high up so that just made me believe it could have been the international space station however i'am doubtful it could just disappear. 

to be honest i didnt think much of it until i seen it disappear. when it did i felt quite... excited  and also curious at what it was.
content.summary: A star like object moving through the sky, stopped then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Woke up about 12:30pm got up to take the dogs out in the back yard. there is a school right behind the house and was watching over the fence at the kids  playing when i heard some jets from nellis i went to look up and straight up  in the 12 o'clock position was a very bright pinpoint star like object very high up. at first it was stationary for the first couple of minutes than it started to drift slowly north to the sheep range/ nellis range. first thought was it was a balloon of some sort with a sliver finish but just seemed too bright. was actually quite brilliant. solid blue color stood out very well against the blue daytime sky. after about ten minutes i ran inside to tell the mrs and from the bedroom window on the second floor i pointed it out to her. by now it was further to the north and more at a 10 o'clock position in the sky. i noticed the winds were light out of the sw object still moving straight north. object started to oscillate going from very brilliant to almost invisible some times to other times being a sharp dark pinpoint of a dot. started to become very hard to see and than started moving straight east while still oscillating. about this time i heard the jets again and slow and low over the mountains came a couple of f22s much much lower than the object. once distracted by the f22s and the dogs barking and the mrs asking me repeatedly what the heck is that i lost track of it.
content.summary: Bright blue star like

content.detailedDescription:
This happened 21 years ago and i have not related it to anyone except a few friend in all that time. i am reporting it to mufon now because recent events (the national press club conference, etc.) seems to me to make it more important to do so. i am hoping it will still be helpful after all this time. here is what happened:

in early 1991, i was driving to my home in morro bay, ca with my then 12 year old daughter at around 2:00am in the morning coming from atascadero, ca on hwy 41. there was little or no traffic on this route at that time in the morning. this route descends into a narrow canyon before reaching the coast. as we drove into the canyon a flashing red light caught my attention in my rear view mirror. thinking that it was an emergency vehicle approaching from my rear i was concerned because there was not really much room to pull over and let it pass. as i was watching it in my mirror i noticed that the red light was flash in a very irregular manner, unlike an ambulance or fire truck or police car. at one point the road made a large sweeping curve to the left which allowed me to look back up the canyon, which i did trying to figure how far behind me the lights were. it was then that we came upon a small turnout on the shoulder of the road and i pulled off and stopped and awaited for it to pass. when i looked back i noticed that the red light was now steady and not flashing and i realized that it was coming down the other side of the canyon slightly above and floating above the treetops. it was also maintaining a constant distance above the trees by rising and falling as it floated. there are no roads on that side of the canyon and i could see the reflection of the red glow which was coming from the curved bottom of a small (no more than 20 feet) disk shaped craft moving somewhat slowly as it followed the hillside. as my daughter had been dozing, i woke her and called her attention to what i was seeing. i also rolled down my window at this point and could tell at this time that the disk was absolutely silent - no noise at all. as we continued to watch the craft made it's way further down the canyon to a position across and slightly above ours and after passing that point it began to rise along the hillside while still moving forward until it reached the ridge at which point it went up and over the ridge and descended over the other side and out of sight. at this point it began to sink in that what we had just seen was a ufo and i experienced the hair on the back of my neck standing up. in a moment, wanting to see more, i got back on the road and sped down the canyon trying to gain another vantage point to see it again. i was not able to. my daughter was excited and agitated and kept asking me, "what was that daddy?", but i had no answer. we went the last few miles home in silence and soon went to bed. i know what i saw. i know it was strange, but i also know it was not some ordinary object or vehicle. as i said, to this day i have not recounted this to any but a few close family and friends. i can only hope that there is something useful and/or helpful here. i certainly will never forget it.
content.summary: Stopped my vehicle and witnessed a disk with a red glow floating silently down a canyon near morro bay, ca

content.detailedDescription: On the night of october 25th, 2009 at about 8:45 pm i was outside on my back patio which faces north and i was looking at the stars, which i often do because i enjoy astronomy, and to have a smoke when i noticed what i thought was a big bird, for a split second, in the sky traveling from south to north. i stood up and noticed that there were two of them. then i realized that each object had six amber lights, 3 on each side and the objects were triangular in shape and had rounded tips. they were very slow moving and made absolutely no sound at all. it was at this point that i realize what i was looking at. i was in so much shock i couldn't speak and tell my husband. one of the objects was positioned slightly in front of the other. then i notice that these objects where completely blocking my view of the stars to the north. the sky and stars in that area were distorted kind of like they were being pulled towards the center of the ufo and then they suddenly disappeared. since then i guess you would say i have been in denial. i reported that same night to the national ufo reporting website and just buried that event then when my report posted on the website i discovered that another person here in hemet also seen a ufo about 15 minutes prior to me and i literally freaked out. it became real to me. i just can't believe that this is really real. i had always been a skeptic. i was curious but now i am a believer!
content.summary: 2 triangle shaped ufo sighted for short time then they distorted the night sky and disappear

content.detailedDescription: today 11/3/11 approximately around 9:15, i went outside to smoke a cigarette because i was mad at the world of course. then i asked my neighbor to use her phone. as i was standing outside listening to the phone dial. the sky caught my eye and i just froze and stared at this big premises in the sky with bright lights circling around then coming together really fast. i told my friend on the phone what i had seen and he just laughed at me and called me crazy. i know what i saw. i was disappointed. i was thinking that it was a child with some crazy flash light but the circles spun so fast i new it wasn't. after i hung up with my friend i was so upset with him that i wasn't paying attention anymore so i went inside. later on i came back outside and the sky seemed very different. the clouds where red like an indian sky only in the night but there was black gas paint looking splatters that threw me off. i observed everything. that is the only clue i had. i came inside and looked some stuff up on this mysterious happening and found some interesting stuff. i love this kind of stuff and feel pretty awesome witnessing it. it's kind of a highlight of my day after how foul it was.
content.summary: Four bright lights going in fast circles then comeing together

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my porch of my apartment smoking a cigarette. i was looking straight up at the stars when it came into view. it was traveling south to north and gliding at a i would say 30 mph rate. i think it is safe to say that it was probably 200ft-300ft above me. it was a perfect triangle shape with 5 white protruding circles on the bottom ( one at the tip and 2 on each side of it. the underbelly was clearly visible from my postion. it glided by with no sound what so ever! i lost it after 6-7seconds. when it disappeared i ran inside to report. i have never seen anything like that in my life!!! it scared me and shook me up pretty bad!!
content.summary: Close ufo sighting!!!

content.detailedDescription: It was the night of october the 28th, 2010 between 8:00pm and 8:30pm.  i was talking to a friend on the phone while standing in my back yard (slidell, louisiana, 30 miles to the north of new orleans, louisiana), watching my dog.  my friend asked if it was cloudy and i looked up and said no, the stars are out, then all of a sudden i realized something was blocking the area of sky i had been looking at.  it was a large rectangular craft,dark in color, smooth texture, no lights, no sound.   my guess was it was approximately 50 to 60 feet in length, not far above the trees, moving from southeast towards the northwest, so slowly i cannot imagine how it stayed in the sky.  i could not move, i was so frightened, and repeatedly said, oh my god, over and over in a frightened voice, until i heard my friend asking if i was alright, i described what i was seeing to him, and at first he laughed thinking i was joking, but realized i wasn't.  the object made absolutely no noise, not a dog in the area barked, including my dog. the ufo slide through the sky effortlessly. i am wondering if anyone else in my area saw this ufo?  it was spectacular!  i've never seen anything like it before!  wish i hadn't felt so frightened.  i watched it until i couldn't see it anymore, it disappeared behind the trees.  the whole incident lasted about 15 minutes, or less.
content.summary: Triangular shaped ufo, no sound, no lights, very slow moving.
